fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, Education and training, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Sport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: EU policies on culture, education, external affairs, home affairs, humanitarian aid,  sport, youth. No specific legislative files are followed.
organisation_name: AMERICAN HELLENIC EDUCATIONAL PROGRESSIVE ASSOCIATION CHAPTER 610 EUROPEAN EAGLE BRUSSELS (AHEPA 610 BRUSSELS)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Promoting Hellenism, Education, Philanthropy, Civic Responsibility, Family and Individual Excellence
relevant_communication:
Meetings with high-level EU officials to inform and communicate the Organization's objectives. 
Mainly, implementation of projects of philanthropic character, promotion of education and civic responsibility.
